comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: From the caption, this is probably Mrs. Jennie May Eaton aged 45 years. See here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3201917528/ State Detective Scott, of Massachusetts arrested her. Notably, "She was a descendent of President William Henry Harrison and a cousin of President Benjamin Harrison. She was once the wife of D. H. Ainsworth a Clerk of the United States Senate" (ref. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=950CEED9133BE633A... She was acquitted at her murder trial, and on June 3, 1914 she remarried her first husband D. Henry Ainsworth; (ref. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B03E5D7173AE633A... )

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: lifeasdaddy, thank you for this information! We will clarify the name in the source data and reload the description.
